entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 7.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
